column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////At the end of the meal... we open up the bill
column2: and it was FREE.  The whole meal
column3: including the sangria!  Because the food was so good
column4: and the fact that the manager/hostess knew enough that we had gotten screwed on our table
column5: and they fixed it without a single complaint
column6: I am DEFINITELY going back (I think I'll make a reservation this time though...)
